title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
Introducing the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, specifically designed to meet all your dehydrating needs! With its large drying space of 6.48ft², this dehydrator provides ample room for drying a variety of foods such as herbs, meat, fruit, and even yogurt. 

Designed in California, this dehydrator combines functionality and style. Powered by a 600W motor, it offers efficient and quick drying. The maximum temperature of 165°F ensures optimal dehydration while preserving the natural flavors and nutrients of your food. The hot air circulation, facilitated by the rear fan, ensures even drying throughout the trays.

Featuring 6 stainless steel trays, each measuring 12 x 13 inches, you have plenty of space to dehydrate large batches of food. The stainless steel material ensures durability and easy cleaning. Speaking of cleaning, the dishwasher-safe trays make cleanup a breeze.

With a 48-hour timer and a temperature control range of 95°–165°F, you have full control over the dehydration process. The digital control panel, equipped with a touch-control LED display, allows for easy adjustment of settings. 

Safety is a top priority with this dehydrator. It comes with an auto-shutoff feature and overheat protection, giving you peace of mind while you go about your day. 

Operating at a quiet level of less than 48dB, this dehydrator won't disturb your household. 

Designed for use in the USA and Canada with a voltage of 120V, this dehydrator is compatible with the electrical systems of these regions. The glass door adds a touch of elegance, allowing you to monitor the drying process without opening the door.

But that's not all! The COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky also comes with additional accessories to enhance your dehydrating experience. It includes a mesh screen measuring 10.7 x 11.8 inches, perfect for drying smaller food items, and a fruit roll sheet measuring 11.3 x 12.8 inches, ideal for making delicious fruit roll-ups.

In addition, you'll receive a recipe book with 50 included recipes, providing endless inspiration for creating healthy and tasty snacks.

Invest in the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky and enjoy the convenience of preserving your favorite foods while adding a touch of sophistication to your kitchen. Start your dehydrating journey today!

The sleek silver design with a glass door adds a touch of elegance to your kitchen. Not only does it look great, but it also features a memory function, allowing you to save your preferred settings for future use.

But that's not all! The COSORI Food Dehydrator comes with 50 included recipes to inspire your culinary creations. Plus, it includes additional accessories such as a mesh screen and fruit roll sheet, expanding the versatility of your dehydrator.

Compatible with voltage of 120V and designed for use in the USA and Canada, this dehydrator is a must-have for any kitchen. Don't miss out on the opportunity to extend the shelf life of your favorite foods with the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky. Get yours today and start enjoying healthy and delicious snacks!
